 2006-11872006-10-30,  TC,  ,  , 
ActRoyal Canadian Mint Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of JAMES BARTON LOVE, Q.C., of Islington, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Royal Canadian Mint to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Thomas V. Taylor.
AttachmentsAttachment
